```{r SpeciesImage, fig.width = 3, fig.height = 1.5}
# Read image
SPECIES_IMAGE = image_read(paste0("../inputs/charts/", ES_SPECIES_CODE, "_SOURCE.png"))

# Add white border left+right
SPECIES_IMAGE = image_border(SPECIES_IMAGE, "white", "1000x0")

# Export image
image_write(SPECIES_IMAGE, path = paste0("../inputs/charts/", ES_SPECIES_CODE, ".png"), format = "png")

# Include image
include_graphics(paste0("../inputs/charts/", ES_SPECIES_CODE, ".png"))
```
